Introduction
This topic contains instructions for handling errors and discrepancies involving the payment of VA benefits to Veterans that are eligible for MRP, including
how RPCs handle a VA error in the assignment of an effective date
actions to take upon receipt of notice from an RPC of a VA error in the assignment of an effective date
, and
RO action upon discovery of an error in the assignment of an effective date
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section C - Coordinating Military Retired Pay (MRP) Cases With Retired Pay Centers (RPCs) and Service Departments
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section C
